text:
IBM Watson Health | Multiple positions | Dallas, TX | Onsite | Full-time | Citizen | Ruby on Rails, React, .Net, Mongo

I’m currently a Rails Developer for IBM Watson Health out of Dallas. My team is working on tools to allow healthcare providers to holistically manage their patient populations.

For the Rails roles, a little experience in React would be a bonus. My personal email is in my profile. Feel free to reach out!

####
